Great app, worked out of the box while brightness-controller (apt) did not. My monitor is not referenced yet in the app's database, but the generic profile does the job! Kudos to the development team.
summary: Works great - Ubuntu 22.04 and Dell S3423DWC

description: I've been dreaming with that for a long time. Thanks devs!

I used this tool to adjust my external screens' brightness and contrast. It works OK on my HDMI and DP connected Dell screens, even though it shows a message that the screens are unknown and require clicking "OK" to dismiss it - everytime I choose a screen (not even one time per launch - every time I switch screens).

It doesn't support my laptop's built in screen (which is OK for me because I have hardware controls for that). Aside from that and the annoyting "screen is not in the database" error you get for any screens newer than 10 years old, the main con for this application is that it looks very archaic - it is very minimal and would not look out of place on your 90s FVWM linux desktop.
summary: Works OK for most uses, not modern

description: I've a dual monitor setup, brightness and contrast works.
You can control your "external" screen brightness in a good way ✅

When I open the porgram it shows i2c-10, i2c-8 and i2c-7, with the error message :
An error occurred while opening the monitor device.
Maybe this monitor was disconnected, please click on the refresh button near the monitor list.

And after refreshing it shows i2c-11, i2c-8 and i2c-7.

7 and 8 don't do anything. 11 is my second monitor.
summary: 2 exact same monitors, only one can be adjusted

description:
It works great for me. I use a 24 inch external monitor. This app supports changing brightness of that external monitor. It does not support changing brightness of the builtin laptop screen, but that is perfectly fine for me, as I can easily change laptop screen brightness using dedicated keyboard buttons or from the top right system menu.

The big advantage of this app is that it remembers the screen brightness values at each startup. So everytime you start your computer, the brightness is always the one that you had set.

My moniter brightness porblem is solve.
Thanks to 'DDC Control'
Works on one of my two BenQ monitors - monitor must support DCC and my older BenQ doesn't, but for the newer display, DCC Control works well and is useful.
I just needed to control the brightness and contrast which isn't in the display settings for some reason. This does the job well.
Funciona muy bien para manipular los controles de uno o más monitores sin tener que tocar sus botones.
Aunque mi monitor no aparece en la base de datos, pude controlar perfectamente el brillo, ¡muchas gracias!
es lenta en cargar y no permite ajustar el brillo de manera rapida, pero funciona y se agradece
medio lenta pero hace lo que tiene que hacer
